fxInfo_question: Which offices (if any) experienced turnover as a result of this national election?

fxInfo_responses.value: A new president took office. S/he is a member of the same party as the previous president.(0=No, 1=Yes) [v2eltvrexn_0]
A new president took office. S/he is a member of a different party than the previous president. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2eltvrexn_1]
A new prime minister took office. S/he is a member of the same party as the previous prime minister. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2eltvrexn_2]
A new prime minister took office. S/he is a member of a different party than the previous prime minister. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2eltvrexn_3]
No change in personnel or party control occurred in the presidency or the prime ministerâ€™s office. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2eltvrexn_4]
